title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When modifying the default value of a list box report parameter, the previously set default value is lost.
EB: The list box report parameter should retain the initially set default value even after modifying it.
SR:
1. Create a new report parameter and set its Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog again.
5. Verify that the default value of the list box parameter is still 'aa' and not 'aaa'.
